1.0.name: wordpress/authanvil-wordpress-logon-agent
1.0.description:
This plugin enables two-factor authentication for WordPress using the AuthAnvil Strong Authentication Server.
To use this plugin, you must have access to an AuthAnvil Server and have a user and a token configured. The requirement to use AuthAnvil is set on a per-user basis, with the default set to not require two-factor authentication.
